channel.title: Client to use if your using deltascape
channel.description:
Ok well i took deltascape v16 and added swats emote system + the extending i believe and decided to release it because people can just basically have a small client with emote systems. This is my first release do not flame please
http://www.mediafire.com/?tdj2m352mjy
[IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/21jwz5z.jpg[/img]
Enjoy,
credits: Delta (for client) Me (for adding emote systems) Kingdomkey01 (for helping me with an error i kept getting) Swat ( for the emote systems)

item.title: Client to use if your using deltascape
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

destroynoobz:

no i never said any of that i took delta’s client… added swats emote system and released what your saying is correct but what is the problem with that it saves people like 20 mins of doing it probbly less and new people can use it so they dont get errors

that’s spoon feeding, isn’t it? people should follow tutorials and get errors and learn from them to make better code, and not just copy stuff off other servers.

Read full topic
